snippet: Diego Maradona said he could be the next coach of Venezuela, the only South American country that has never made it to the World Cup.
abstract: Diego Maradona says he could be next coach of Venezuela's national soccer team, only team from South America that has never made it to the World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Diego Maradona said he could be the next coach of Venezuela, the only South American country that has never made it to the World Cup.

headline.main: Maradona Says He Could Coach Venezuela
